name: Melee Box Survival
description:
We recommand you to play this game with a gamepad  \(￣︶￣*\))

Game Created in 3 days for the 23rd ScoreJam on the theme of 'Survival'

Try to survive in this deadly forest.
Gather points by collecting chest, which gives you a random weapon (or no weapon at all if you are unlucky!)
We hope you like it ! 

Command: 
Movement: Arrow keys OR Left Stick
Jump: Up arrow OR the "down" button on a gamepad (X for playstation for example

Attack: Space OR "left" button on a gamepad





Created By: 
Jean JANIN
Lucie MANGIN
Ugo FIGHIERA
